title: Please help with decorative font
author: MThawkwood

comments.content: I think it's - Iso Metrix Light NF

It looks like **[Existence (Light)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112108/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Existence%20-%20Light&fid=31d1ca77eca12c27cb7d61666db19be1&fsize=60&text=BUMPstyle%20Box&fit=1)** free font by Yeah Noah [2004]
